Text:
Awesome! First time I've ever downloaded a textbook. You saved me over $200 and it took like 3 minutes.

Seriously, can't thank you enough.

******THE FOLLOWING IS A COPY OF THE NOTICE SENT TO MY ISP FOR DOWNLOADING THIS TORRENT (DESPITE USING THE BLOCKLIST AT http://www.bluetack.co.uk/config/level1.gz)*******

Notice Date: 29 Aug 2011 [time redacted] 

Unauthorized Use of Cengage Learning Intellectual Property

[My ISP]

Dear Sir or Madam:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Cengage Learning ("Cengage"), and that the information contained herein is, to the best of my knowledge, truthful and accurate. 

It has come to our attention that [My ISP] is the service provider for the IP address listed below from which unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file serving, file "swapping" or other similar activities) of Cengage's intellectual property is taking place. Cengage has a good faith belief that use of the property in the manner described herein is not authorized by Cengage and therefore infringes Cengage's rights according to state, federal, or United States law.

More specifically, the unauthorized copying and distribution of Cengage's intellectual property identified below constitutes copyright infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act. Depending upon the type of service [My ISP] is providing to this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not expeditiously remove or disable access to the material listed below, or if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of subscribers who are repeat infringers (see 17 U.S.C. B' 512).

Although various legal and equitable remedies may be available to Cengage as a result of such infringement, Cengage believes that the Internet community benefits when copyright matters of this type are resolved cooperatively. 

Accordingly, we urge you to take immediate action to effect removal of the detected infringement listed in the report below, including:

(1) Notify the account holder of this infringement.
(2) Require the account holder remove the infringing material.
(3) Disable access to the infringing material.
(4) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service.

Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter, making sure to reference the Notice ID number above in your response. [mailto link redacted]

Account holders can acquire Cengage Learning materials legally by visiting CengageBrain at:

www.cengagebrain.com/shop/index.html?cid=BayTspIEP 

CengageBrain.com is the leading destination for purchasing Cengage Learning textbooks, eBooks, eChapters, study tools, and textbook rentals at significant discount.

Please be advised that this letter is not a complete statement of the facts or law as they may pertain to this matter or of Cengage's positions, rights or remedies, legal or equitable, all of which are expressly reserved.

Sincerely,

Jessica Stitt

Senior Infringement & Anti-Piracy Paralegal
Cengage Learning
27500 Drake Road
Farmington Hills, MI 48331
Tel: 248-699-8027 Fax: 248-699-8074
E-Mail: jessica.stitt@cengage.com 

cc: William A. Sampson, Esq. 
Director, Rights Protection & Enforcement
Cengage Learning

Thank you very much
Really appreciate your effort

God Damnit! The one time that I don't read the comments that of course has a warning that this torrent is being watched and of course I get a letter from my ISP in the mail. Well, looks like I'm done with torrents...
